answers.a: The process of formulating the mapping from a given input to an output using fuzzy logic
answers.b: Changing the output value to match the input value to give it an equal balance
answers.c: Having a larger output than the input
answers.d: Having a smaller output than the input

questions.question: Where Has Fuzzy Inference Systems Been Implemented?

answers.a: Wireless services, heat control and printers
answers.b: Restrict power usage, telephone lines and sort data
answers.d: Automatic control, decision analysis and data classification
